entities.name: PILLARS OF HERCULES
entities.description: The modern-day Strait of Gibraltar, which, according to Plato, marked the boundary beyond which Atlantis was located

entities.name: Curiosity
entities.description: A strong desire to know or learn something.

entities.name: legend
entities.description: A narrative of supernatural or mythical events.

entities.name: ATLANTIC OCEAN
entities.description: A proposed location for the legendary island of Atlantis, based on interpretations of Plato's descriptions

entities.name: People
entities.description: The story of Atlantis continues to captivate the imaginations of people around the world, sparking curiosity and wonder.

entities.name: MEDITERRANEAN SEA
entities.description: Another proposed location for the legendary island of Atlantis, based on various theories and interpretations

entities.name: Plato"s Dialogues
entities.description: Plato"s dialogues are a collection of philosophical works written by the ancient Greek philosopher Plato. These dialogues explore various philosophical concepts and ideas.

entities.name: Wonder
entities.description: A feeling of amazement and admiration, often caused by something beautiful, unexpected, or unfamiliar.

entities.name: ANTARCTICA
entities.description: A less conventional proposed location for the legendary island of Atlantis, based on some speculative theories

entities.name: Perceptions of History
entities.description: The way history is understood and interpreted by society.

entities.name: Perceptions of Human Achievement
entities.description: The way human achievements are understood and valued by society.

entities.name: STRAIT OF GIBRALTAR
entities.description: A narrow body of water connecting two larger bodies of water, separating Europe and Africa.

entities.name: lost civilization
entities.description: A lost civilization refers to an ancient society that has been forgotten or disappeared from historical records, often associated with advanced knowledge and technology.

attributes.Imagination: Captures the imagination of those who seek to uncover the truth
attributes.Knowledge and Technology: Possessed knowledge and technology far beyond our own (according to some beliefs)

entities.name: ATLANTEANS
entities.description: The inhabitants of the legendary island of Atlantis, described as a noble and virtuous people who eventually became corrupt and power-hungry, leading to their downfall

entities.name: Expeditions and Theories
entities.description: The legend of Atlantis has inspired numerous expeditions and theories over the centuries, as people seek to uncover the truth behind this ancient civilization.
